org.shortbrain.vaadin.container

Class ContainerFactory<BEAN>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shortbrain.vaadin.container.ContainerFactory<BEAN>
  • Type Parameters:
    BEAN - type of the beans.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractContainerFactory

    public abstract class ContainerFactory<BEAN>
extends Object
    ContainerFactory abstract class that define methods to facilitate the creation of Containers from a list of objects using different algorithms.
    Author:
    Vincent Demeester

      • getContainerFromList

        @Deprecated
public abstract com.vaadin.data.Container getContainerFromList(com.vaadin.data.Container container,
                                                        List<BEAN> beans)
        Deprecated. should use getContainerFromCollection instead.
        Return a container of type BEAN from a list of BEAN objects. It will update the given container if no null.
        Parameters:
        container - container to be populated.
        beans - list of beans.
        Returns:
        a container of Beans.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • getContainerFromList

        @Deprecated
public abstract com.vaadin.data.Container getContainerFromList(com.vaadin.data.Container container,
                                                        List<BEAN> beans,
                                                        Class<? extends com.vaadin.data.Container> containerClass)
        Deprecated. should use getContainerFromCollection instead.
        Return a container of type BEAN from a list of BEAN objects. It will update the given container if no null. The returned container will be of the given type (containerClass).
        Parameters:
        container - container to be populated.
        beans - list of beans.
        containerClass - type of the container to return.
        Returns:
        a container of Beans.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • getContainerFromList

        @Deprecated
public abstract com.vaadin.data.Container getContainerFromList(List<BEAN> beans,
                                                        Class<? extends com.vaadin.data.Container> containerClass)
        Deprecated. should use getContainerFromCollection instead.
        Return a container of type BEAN from a list of BEAN objects. The returned container will be of the given type (containerClass).
        Parameters:
        beans - list of beans.
        containerClass - type of the container to return.
        Returns:
        a container of Beans.
        Since:
        0.1.0

        Return a container of type BEAN from a collection of BEAN objects. It will update the given container if no null.

        Since:

      • getContainerFromCollection

        public abstract com.vaadin.data.Container getContainerFromCollection(com.vaadin.data.Container container,
                                                   Collection<BEAN> beans,
                                                   Class<? extends com.vaadin.data.Container> containerClass)
        Return a container of type BEAN from a collection of BEAN objects. It will update the given container if no null. The returned container will be of the given type (containerClass).
        Parameters:
        container - container to be populated.
        beans - collection of beans.
        containerClass - type of the container to return.
        Returns:
        a container of Beans.
        Since:
        0.1.3

      • getContainerFromCollection

        public abstract com.vaadin.data.Container getContainerFromCollection(Collection<BEAN> beans,
                                                   Class<? extends com.vaadin.data.Container> containerClass)
        Return a container of type BEAN from a collection of BEAN objects. The returned container will be of the given type (containerClass).
        Parameters:
        beans - collection of beans.
        containerClass - type of the container to return.
        Returns:
        a container of Beans.
        Since:
        0.1.3

      • getByAnnotation

        public static final <T> ContainerFactory<T> getByAnnotation(Class<? extends T> beanClass,
                                      ContainerType containerType)
        Create a ContainerFactory of type T using a default AnnotationReaderAlgorithm.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - type of the container.
        containerType - type of container (used by AnnotationReaderAlgorithm)
        Returns:
        a ContainerFactory.
        See Also:
        getByAlgorithm(Class, PropertyReaderAlgorithm)

      • getByAlgorithm

        public static final <T> ContainerFactory<T> getByAlgorithm(Class<? extends T> beanClass,
                                     PropertyReaderAlgorithm algorithm)
        Create a ContainerFactory of type T using a PropertyReaderAlgorithm.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - type of the container.
        algorithm - PropertyReaderAlgorithm to use.
        Returns:
        a ContainerFactory.
